title: Creating/importing Subfolders
creator: kingappi99
content: I just switched to K9/Thunderbird pn my Android device Is there a way to create/import subfolder which i use for my mailbox before? My account is using POP/SMTP and work fine except thr subfolder

title: thunderbird for android
creator: PETER899
content: 8 accounts in desktop thunderbird. On import to android thunderbird 3 remain separate with inboxes, the others combined inappropriately into unified inbox. Clicking off unified inbox in display settings leaves these accounts with no display except an empty outbox folder. Their other folders and any contents are invisible. How to maintain separately managed accounts, each with inbox and all other folders?
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Android 14; Mobile; rv:135.0) Gecko/135.0 Firefox/135.0;os:redmi note 13 android 14

title: SocketTimeoutException, when responding to mails Thunderbird for Android
creator: axel.zuleger
content:
When responding to Mails, I often get error messages, that GMX server can't be reached. These emails remain in outbox forever and are also not processed later. If a fresh mail is created afterwards, it is sent immediately without any flaws. Unfortunately the earlier response mail is not processed also then.

Any suggestions?
metadata: ;useragent:Mozilla/5.0 (Linux; Android 10; K) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/132.0.0.0 Mobile Safari/537.36;os:Android 14

title: sent emails stuck in outbox
creator: rosedelightfulart
content: Sent emails are stuck in outbox with no way to send them, happens on both mobile & WiFi. The send messages option in the outbox isn't working'.
